lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Blanche. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Park East Day School, mourns Blanche Shapiro, who with her beloved husband, Romie, of blessed memory, were generous supporters of our Scholarship Fund to strengthen Jewish identity through education and culture. Her life was a blessing. 1/3
